TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRow extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand

summary.span: 表示 控件中的行。

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 控件中的一行。The class represents a row in a control. 您可以通过控件的 和 集合来检索行。You can retrieve rows through the and collections of the control. 与 不同， 物理上包含该行中所有单元格的集合。Unlike a , a physically contains a collection of all of the cells in that row. 可以通过 属性访问此集合。You can access this collection through the property. 类用于访问单个单元格元素，并用于调整行用户界面（UI）的外观和行为，例如高度和单元格样式。The class is used to access the individual cell elements, as well as to adjust the appearance and behavior of the row user interface (UI), such as height and cell style. 通常，您将希望控件中的所有行或大多数行共享相同的特性。Typically, you will want all rows or most rows in the control to share the same characteristics. 若要设置控件中所有行的单元格样式，请设置 属性返回的对象的属性。To set cell styles for all rows in the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要为交替行设置样式，请使用 属性。To set styles for alternating rows, use the property. 有关单元格样式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 你还可以使用 属性来定义将用作添加到控件的所有行的基础的行。You can also use the property to define a row that will be used as a basis for all rows added to the control. 控件将尽可能跨多个数据行共享 对象，以避免性能下降。The control will share objects across multiple data rows whenever possible to avoid performance penalties. 除非您使用的数据量很大并且遇到性能问题，否则您通常可以忽略行共享。Unless you are working with large amounts of data and experiencing performance issues, you can typically ignore row sharing. 共享行由 属性值-1 表示。A shared row is indicated by an property value of -1. 类的某些成员不能用于共享行，但您可以通过 属性访问行来取消共享行。Some members of the class cannot be used with shared rows, but you can unshare a row by accessing it through the property. 还可以通过其他方式取消共享行。Rows can also become unshared in other ways. 若要在不取消共享行的情况下访问该行，请使用 方法。To access a row without unsharing it, use the method. 处理大量数据时，应了解如何共享和取消共享行，以避免性能下降。When working with large amounts of data, you should be aware of how rows are shared and unshared to avoid performance penalties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 此示例摘自[如何：操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中的行中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#209)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#209)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#209](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#209)]

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在用户右键单击行时所显示的快捷菜单，除非 控件 事件或行 属性将覆盖所单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is displayed when the user right-clicks the row unless the control event or the row property overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 当 控件 属性 设置为 `true`，获取 属性的值将引发控件的 事件，并返回事件处理程序中指定的 属性的值。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有针对事件的处理程序，则获取 属性的值将返回以前指定的值或其默认值 `null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 在为多个行设置行 值时，处理大量数据时，处理 事件主要用于避免性能损失。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 更改此属性将引发所属 上的 事件（如果存在）。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 如果当前行是共享的，请使用 方法，而不是获取此属性的值。If the current row is shared, use the method rather than getting the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性与 类的 属性几乎完全相同。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例摘自 类中提供的一个更大的代码示例。This code example is part of a larger code example provided in the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#130)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#130)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#130)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法清除行的 ，并将其重新初始化为 `dataGridView` 参数的每一列的 属性。This method clears the row's and reinitializes it with the property of each column of the `dataGridView` parameter. 因此，该行采用 `dataGridView` 参数的行的外观和行为。As a result, the row adopts the appearance and behavior of a row from the `dataGridView` parameter. 如果 `values` 数组中的元素多于要初始化的单元格，则将忽略额外的元素。If there are more elements in the `values` array than cells to be initialized, the extra elements will be ignored. 如果元素数少于所需元素数，则剩余的不匹配单元将保留其默认初始值。If there are fewer elements than required, the remaining unmatched cells will retain their default initial values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你不能直接访问包含对象的数据源时，通过行对象直接访问数据绑定对象非常有用。Accessing data-bound objects directly through row objects is useful when you do not have direct access to the data source containing the objects. 当您希望操作绑定到选定行或作为参数传递给事件处理程序的行时，这也是非常方便的。It is also convenient when you want to manipulate objects bound to selected rows or to rows passed as arguments to event handlers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问绑定到行的业务对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a business object bound to a row. 此代码示例是[如何：访问绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 行的对象](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows)中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Access Objects Bound to Windows Forms DataGridView Rows](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-objects-bound-to-windows-forms-datagridview-rows). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用单元格 属性指示的样式显示其单元格，该属性从 类型的其他属性继承样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 对于此行中的单元格，通过 属性指定的样式将覆盖通过 ""、""、"" 和 "" 属性指定的样式，但会被通过 属性指定的样式覆盖。For cells in this row, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , , and properties, but are overridden by the styles specified through the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 获取此属性时，如果尚未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值的 。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 在为多个行获取此属性时，这可能会影响性能。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 请尽可能使用单个 为多行设置此属性。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主要用于显示的 控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例是 类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的基于内容的自动调整大小功能将使用此属性来确定行的理想高度。This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the control to determine the ideal height of a row. 使用 `rowIndex` 值可以指定共享行的实际行索引。The `rowIndex` value lets you specify the actual row index of a shared row. （共享行的属性值 为-1。）(Shared rows have property values of -1.) `false` 的 `fixedWidth` 参数值基于计算列宽度计算行高，这将实现理想的单元格高度与宽度的比率。A `fixedWidth` parameter value of `false` calculates the row height based on calculated column widths that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios. 若要将单元格内容换行到多行，对单元格有效的单元格样式的 属性值必须为 。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的调整大小选项](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定已调整大小的行的新填充。The following code example uses the method to determine the new padding for a row that has been resized. 此代码示例摘自[如何：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中行的外观](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid)中提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid). remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将此属性用于共享行。You cannot use this property with a shared row. 有关共享行的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about shared rows, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 如果 属性，用户将不能手动调整行高。If the property is , the user will not be able to manually adjust the row height. 默认情况下， 属性值基于 属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value. 但是，如果将 显式设置为 或 ，则将忽略该控件值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 将 设置为 以还原值继承行为。Set to to restore the value-inheritance behavior. 由于 会还原值继承，因此 属性将从不返回 值，除非该行尚未添加到 控件中。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row has not been added to a control. 如果需要确定行的 属性值是继承还是显式指定的，请检查它的 属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row is inherited or has been specified explicitly, check its property. 如果 值包括 标志，则不会继承 属性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks `values` 参数表示用于在行中填充单元值的可变数量的参数。The `values` parameter represents a variable number of arguments used to populate cell values in the row. 这些值可作为多个单独参数或单个 的成员传递给此方法。These values can be passed to this method as multiple, individual arguments or as members of a single . 由于值应为 类型的实例，因此，如果传入值类型值的数组（如 值），此方法会将该数组视为单个对象并将其分配给单个单元。Because the values are expected to be instances of type , however, if you pass in an array of value-type values (such as values), this method will treat the array as a single object and assign it to a single cell. 若要避免此行为，必须将值类型数组强制转换为 数组，或将多个值作为多个参数传递。To avoid this behavior, you must cast a value-type array to an array or pass in multiple values as multiple arguments. 如果 `values` 列表中的值多于要初始化的单元数，则此方法将忽略额外的值并返回 `false`。If there are more values in the `values` list than there are cells to be initialized, this method ignores the extra values and returns `false`. 如果无法设置任何指定值，此方法也会返回 `false`。This method also returns `false` if any of the specified values cannot be set. 如果值少于单元格的值，则剩余的不匹配单元将保留其当前值。If there are fewer values than there are cells, the remaining unmatched cells retain their current values.
